page.title: 15My Day (2)
page.content: A day in my life My name is Claire Rossall I am 10 years old and live at 45 Whitefieids Drive.I wake up at 7.00am and go to bed at 9.30 pm.I go to Richmond Methodist School and my teacher is called Mr Ackroyd.When I get up I have my breakfast get dressed brush my teeth brush my hair put my coat on and walk to school with Joanne my friend.At school we start with Assembly.Then we go to the class room and start Maths.I am on stage 14.After a morning of maths we do English.We do English from Reading Well books.After that we sometimes have games or if its raining we work at English .At 3.35 we go home .I have my tea then watch t.v for a bit or go to ST.Johns where I learn First Aid.I come back watch t.v and go to bed at 9.30 pm.
